## Slide with R Output

```{r cars, echo = TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(rio)
library(tidyverse)
packageVersion("tidyr")

TargetScan <- import("TargetScan.xlsx")
miRecords <- import("miRecords.xlsx", skip=1)
miRTarBase <- import("miRTarBase.xlsx", skip=4)
mirBase <- import("mirBase.xlsx", skip=2)
miRDB <- import("miRDB.xlsx", skip=2)
miRWalk <- import("miRWalk_miRNA_Targets.csv")
```

## Slide with Plot{.smaller}

```{r, echo=TRUE, out.height= "350px", out.width="400px"}
library(UpSetR)
lt = list(set1 = mirBase$ID,set2 = gsub('-3p', '', gsub('-5p', '', miRDB$ID)),set3 = miRecords[['miRNA ID']],
          set4 = miRWalk$mirnaid, set5 = TargetScan$miRNA,set6 = miRTarBase$miRNA)
for(n in names(lt)) {
  lt[[n]] <- unique(lt[[n]])
  lt[[n]] <- tolower(lt[[n]])}
upset(fromList(lt), order.by = 'freq')
```
